commands.name: Get-AzQuotaGroupQuotaSubscriptionRequest
commands.description:
Get API to check the status of a subscriptionIds request by requestId.
Use the polling API - OperationsStatus URI specified in Azure-AsyncOperation header field, with retry-after duration in seconds to check the intermediate status.
This API provides the finals status with the request details and status.

examples.description: Get API to check the status of a subscriptionIds request by requestId.  Use the polling API - OperationsStatus URI specified in Azure-AsyncOperation header field, with retry-after duration in seconds to check the intermediate status. This API provides the finals status with the request details and status.
